task.title: View test results in the Jira Test Results gadget

ul.li: You have enabled TestOps - Jira integration in Jira software. See: .

taskbody.context: You can see the latest results of Katalon test cases in the Jira Test Results gadget. To open the Katalon gadget, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Open you Jira page, then click on the Dashboards tab.
Open or create a dashboard if you haven't had one.
In your dashboard, click Edit > Add gadget.
step.stepresult: The Add a gadget box displays as below.

step.cmd: Find Katalon Test Results and click Add to add the gadget to your dashboard.
Once added, the gadget prompts you to fill in the following information:

li.p: Jira Project: The Jira project that has enabled TestOps - Jira integration.
Katalon Project ID: The project ID of the integrated Katalon organization. To find a Katalon project ID, open your Katalon project in TestOps and view the ID at the end of the URL.
For example, we have a project URL as follows: https://testops.katalon.io/team/12/project/20. The project ID is 20.

taskbody.result:
A table showing the status and duration of each test case appears as below.
View test results in Katalon Test Results gadget
